snippet.title: University sexual assault report: Half of all students harassed at least once in 2016
snippet.content: More than half of all university students were sexually harassed on at least one occasion in 2016, a Human Rights Commission survey has found. The survey also found 6.9 per cent of students were sexually assaulted on at least one occasion in 2015 or 2016. The Human Rights Commission conducted the survey to uncover the extent of sexual assault and harassment on and off campuses. More to come.
